languages.text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Однако готовьтесь к тому, что это не конец наших испытаний. Системы корабля нуждаются в полном осмотре на наличие серьезных повреждений, и осуществить его смогут только на станции {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, единственной верфи сектора. Но, не решив три неотложные проблемы, мы до Футфола просто не долетим".

traits.locale_text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Однако готовьтесь к тому, что это не конец наших испытаний. Корабль нуждается в серьезном ремонте, и осуществить его смогут только на станции {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, единственной верфи сектора. Но, не решив три неотложные проблемы, мы до Футфола просто не долетим".

languages.text: "Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship's systems must be properly inspected for major damage, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Однако готовьтесь к тому, что это не конец наших испытаний. Системы корабля нуждаются в полном осмотре на наличие серьезных повреждений, и осуществить его смогут только на станции {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, единственной верфи сектора. Но, не решив три неотложные проблемы, мы до Футфола просто не долетим".

traits.locale_text: "Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship is in need of serious repairs, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

"Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship is in need of serious repairs, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

"Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship is in need of serious repairs, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

"Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship is in need of serious repairs, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

"Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship's systems must be properly inspected for major damage, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

languages.text: “正是如此，舰长大人。但请记住，就算解决了这些问题，我们的困境也并没有结束。我们必须对这艘飞船进行彻底检查，看看关键区域是否遭到了破坏。我们只能在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}修船，那里是这片区域唯一的星港。但如果不先解决这三个迫切的问题，我们恐怕永远都到不了落脚港。”
languages.original_text: "Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship's systems must be properly inspected for major damage, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

traits.locale_text: “正是如此，舰长大人。但请记住，就算解决了这些问题，试炼也并没有结束。这艘船需要大修一番，我们只能在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}修船，那里是这片区域唯一的星港。但如果不先解决这三个迫切的问题，我们恐怕永远都到不了落脚港。”

languages.text: 「その通りです、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、これで試練が終わるわけではないことを覚えておいてください。船のシステムに大きな損傷がないか、しっかりと点検せねばなりません。それはこの区域で唯一の造船所がある{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}ステーションでしか行えません。ですが、まずはこの3つの問題を解決しなければ、フットフォールに到着することはできないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship's systems must be properly inspected for major damage, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、これで試練が終わるわけではないことを覚えておいてください。この船には深刻な修理が必要であり、それはこの区域で唯一の造船所がある{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}ステーションでしか行えません。ですが、まずはこの3つの問題を解決しなければ、フットフォールに到着することはできないでしょう」

languages.text: "Exakt, Lord Captain. Aber vergesst nicht, dass unsere Prüfungen damit nicht beendet sind. Die Systeme des Schiffs müssen eingehend auf Schäden geprüft werden, was nur auf der {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}-Station möglich ist, weil sich dort das einzige Dock im Sektor befindet. Aber wir werden Footfall nie erreichen, wenn wir nicht zuerst diese drei dringlichen Probleme lösen."
languages.original_text: "Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship's systems must be properly inspected for major damage, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

traits.locale_text: "Exakt, Lord Captain. Aber vergesst nicht, dass unsere Prüfungen damit nicht beendet sind. Das Schiff benötigt größere Reparaturen, die nur auf der Station {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} durchgeführt werden können, weil sich dort das einzige Dock im Sektor befindet. Aber wir werden Footfall nie erreichen, wenn wir nicht zuerst diese drei dringlichen Probleme lösen."

languages.text: « Précisément, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais souvenez-vous que ce ne sont pas là nos seuls soucis. Les systèmes du vaisseau doivent être passés au crible en quête d'éventuelles avaries majeures, et nous ne pourrons le faire qu'à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, qui abrite le seul chantier naval du secteur. Cependant, nous n'atteindrons jamais Castel sans résoudre en premier lieu ces trois problèmes. »
languages.original_text: "Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship's systems must be properly inspected for major damage, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

traits.locale_text: « Précisément, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais gardez en tête que ce ne sont pas là nos seuls soucis. Le vaisseau a besoin de réparations d'ampleur et celles-ci ne pourront être effectuées qu'à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, qui abrite le seul chantier naval du secteur. Cependant, nous n'atteindrons jamais Castel sans résoudre en premier lieu ces trois problèmes. »

languages.text: «Exacto, Lord Capitán. Pero recuerde que esta no será la última de nuestras tribulaciones. Hay que inspeccionar detenidamente los sistemas de la nave para confirmar la gravedad de los daños, y eso solo podemos hacerlo en la estación de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, donde se encuentra el único muelle del sector. Pero no llegaremos a Paso sin resolver nuestros tres problemas más inmediatos».
languages.original_text: "Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship's systems must be properly inspected for major damage, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

traits.locale_text: «Exacto, Lord Capitán. Pero recuerde que esta no será la última de nuestras tribulaciones. La nave necesita reparaciones extensas, y solo podemos realizarlas en la estación de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, donde se encuentra el único muelle del sector. Pero no llegaremos a Paso sin resolver nuestros tres problemas más inmediatos».

languages.text: "Aynen öyle Lord Kaptan. Ancak dertlerimizin bu kadarla kalmayacağını unutmayın. Gemi sistemlerinin büyük çaplı hasar ihtimaline karşı bir güzel muayene edilmesi gerekiyor ve bunu da yalnızca sektördeki tek tersaneye ev sahipliği yapan {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} istasyonunda yaptırabiliriz. Lakin bu üç acil sorunu çözmeden de Binliman'a ulaşmamız mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "Precisely, Lord Captain. But bear in mind that this will not be the end of our trials. The ship's systems must be properly inspected for major damage, which can only be carried out at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} station, home to the only dockyard in the sector. But we will never reach Footfall without first solving these three immediate problems."

traits.locale_text: "Aynen öyle Lord Kaptan. Ancak dertlerimizin bu kadarla kalmayacağını unutmayın. Gemi sistemlerinin büyük çaplı hasar ihtimaline karşı adamakıllı muayene edilmesi gerekiyor ve bunu da yalnızca sektördeki tek tersaneye ev sahipliği yapan {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} istasyonunda yaptırabiliriz. Lakin bu üç acil sorunu çözmeden de Binliman'a ulaşmamız mümkün değil."
